SAFE.getNonoverlapDocs(List<ScoredEntity<T>> sampledDocs, int lastSeenIndex, int offset, Map<Integer,Double> rank2score)
          For each sample document starting from lastSeenIndex estimates its source-specific rank according to the following formula: r_c = offset + (r_s - 0.5) * rankRatio.
